§Member of San Jose Clean Energy Program, which allows 
us to purchase clean power from wind, solar, and carbon at 
a lower cost
§Increased our offices’ sustainability by converting 25% of 
our sites to LED lighting and sensors and expanding the 
program to additional locations
§Optimized building performance by upgrading 
HVAC equipment
§Upgraded 18 EV charging stations to rapid -charging 
stations to support increasing EV demandEnergy Use and Conservation
As a fabless semiconductor company, the sustainable 
operation of our office buildings globally accounts for 
the majority of our environmental impact; therefore, 
Lattice reviews the latest technologies and regulatory 
trends to support consistent energy reduction for 
improved results.
CONSERVATION
